name: Hanoi_Towers
description:
Can you solve this relatively simple puzzle? Just move one disc at a time to get all the discs transferred to the third post. You cannot put a larger disc on a smaller one, however.

I learned this game as a child in my grandparent's front room. It has fascinated me ever since.

This app contains a hint button which will show you the next best move to make. It can even solve itself for you, if you wish to see that.

Have fun!
